value.title: Solving common challenges in sentiment analysis with help from Project Debater
value.excerpt: Today, we are going to talk about a feature that isn’t always talked a lot in the AI space: sentiment analysis. What is sentiment analysis? Sentiment analysis is a subset of natural language processing (NLP) capabilities that provides high level filters for users when exploring and evaluating data.

value.title: AI Needs To Learn Multi-Intent For Computers To Show Empathy
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is smart, but it could do better. The software development industry is constantly working to push algorithmic logic beyond the scope of the current computer processing envelope and create new ways for computers to ‘think’ and emulate human beings.

value.title: Google's AI thinks women wearing masks have mouths covered with duct tape
value.excerpt: According to a study, the visual AIs of Microsoft, Google and IBM have a lot to do to catch up with the real world. Some of the study's results are truly disturbing.

value.title: Researchers discover evidence of gender bias in major computer vision APIs
